backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the project expo app; handles registrations, user profiles, CMS content (hero, about, event details, coordinators, contact), and gallery images, with admin-only access control via included authorization and blob-storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a single revert/restore feature to its associated frontend files, components, and test IDs with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, describing the purpose and key features of every page, component, and hook in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes (colors, radius, sidebar, charts) and applying base border and background styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React SPA, setting the page title to 'National Level Project Expo 2026' and mounting the app via the root div and main.tsx module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router and React Query setup defining all application routes (home, gallery, registration lookup, admin login, admin dashboard) wrapped in AdminAuthProvider, with a RootLayout that applies a page-transition CSS class on route changes.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section component that fetches CMS content via React Query, displays a description and up to three feature cards with IntersectionObserver-triggered staggered bounce-in animations and two drifting background orbs.
frontend/src/components/AdminContentMana: Standalone CMS component with accordion-organized sections for editing Hero, About, Event Details, Coordinators, and Contact content, each with fetch/save mutations and toast feedback using shadcn-ui form controls.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Renders the Contact section with address, phone, email, website, social links, WhatsApp/Instagram quick-action buttons, and an embedded Google Map, pulling dynamic content from a query hook with fallback defaults.
frontend/src/components/Coordinators.tsx: Displays faculty and student coordinator cards with name, role, phone, and email, using IntersectionObserver for scroll-triggered bounce-in animations and falling back to default data if none is fetched.
frontend/src/components/EventDetails.tsx: Shows event info cards (date, venue, fee, eligibility), project categories, and a timeline of milestones with scroll-triggered animations, using fetched content or built-in defaults.
frontend/src/components/FloatingSocialBu: Renders fixed floating action buttons for Instagram and WhatsApp with hover tooltips and scale/shadow effects.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays the site footer with branding, quick-nav links, event info, a scroll-to-top button, and a copyright bar.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Renders the full-screen hero section with a parallax background, typewriter tagline animation, count-up registration counter, and CTA buttons, using fetched hero content with fallback defaults.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with scroll-aware styling, smooth scrolling to page sections, and active link highlighting for both desktop and mobile layouts.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: Route guard component that redirects unauthenticated users to the admin login page using the AdminAuthContext.
frontend/src/components/Registration.tsx: Registration form component for the expo that supports both an embedded Google Form iframe and a native form submission via a backend mutation hook.
frontend/src/context/AdminAuthContext.ts: React context providing admin authentication state persisted in sessionStorage, with login and logout functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using TanStack Query, initializing it with an authenticated or anonymous identity and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication via DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing identity state, login/logout functions, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of TanStack Query hooks for all backend interactions including registrations, admin verification, and CMS content (hero, about, event details, gallery, etc.).
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollAnimation.ts: Hook that uses IntersectionObserver to track when a referenced element enters the viewport, returning a visibility flag for scroll-triggered animations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, defines CSS custom properties for the dark green-themed design system, and declares keyframe animations for page transitions, drifting glow orbs, and shimmer effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the app with QueryClientProvider for React Query and InternetIdentityProvider for ICP authentication wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Simple page component that composes Navbar, About section, Footer, and FloatingSocialButtons into a standalone About page.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Protected admin dashboard page with tabs for managing registrations (search, delete, CSV export) and gallery images (upload, delete), using React Query hooks to interact with the backend canister.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLogin.tsx: Admin login page with email/password form that verifies credentials against the backend canister and redirects to the dashboard on success, displaying appropriate error messages on failure.
frontend/src/pages/EventDetailsPage.tsx: Simple page component that composes Navbar, EventDetails section, Footer, and FloatingSocialButtons into a standalone Event Details page.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Gallery page that fetches images from the backend and displays them in a responsive grid with intersection-observer-driven fade-in animations and a hover overlay showing the image title.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page that assembles all major sections (Hero, About, EventDetails, Coordinators, Registration, Contact) along with Navbar, a footer, and FloatingSocialButtons.
frontend/src/pages/RegistrationLookupPag: Page allowing users to look up their registration status by email, displaying confirmed registration details or a not-found message based on the backend query result.
frontend/src/utils/csvExport.ts: Exports an array of Registration objects to a CSV file by formatting fields, escaping special characters, and triggering a browser download with a date-stamped filename.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL bar without a page reload.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that sets up dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color tokens, border radii, accordion keyframe animations, and registers the typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata and feature state, recording a single completed feature to revert the application to its last known stable frontend and backend version.
